Viewing the Visual Diff Menus

Visual Diff has its own set of menu options, which are described below.

File Menu

Open Files...

Start the file comparison process. When you click Open, the Select First File dialog opens. After you select the first file, the Select Second File dialog opens.

Open Folders...

Start the folder comparison process. When you click Open, the Select First Folder dialog opens. After you select the first folder, the Select Second Folder dialog opens.

Close

Close the current selected files or folders.

Merge Files...

Merge the currently selected files.

Print Setup...

Select or set up a printer.

Print...

Print the compared files as a single file.

Chart

Create a chart.

Exit

End this session of Visual Diff.

Edit Menu

Copy

Copy selected text to the clipboard.

Encoding

Change file encodings.

Options

Displays tabs that allow you to change the display, color, merge, and comparison options used for Visual Diff.

Search Menu

Find

Find the first occurrence of the search text.

Find Next

Find the next occurrence of the search text.

Next Difference

Move back to the previous difference.

Previous Difference

Move forward to the next difference.

Next Match

Move forward to the next matching block of text.

Previous Match

Move back to the previous matching block of text.

Window

Split Vertically

View the compared files side-by-side.

Split Horizontally

View the compared files top-and-bottom.

Show Together

View the compared files as one file, with the differences clearly labeled.

Switch Comparison Order

Switch the comparison order of the two files, or switch which pane displays which file.

Help

Help Topics

Display the contents of the help file.

About Visual Diff

See display release, copyright, and licensing information about Visual Diff.
